mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_userno , board_title , board_content , board_ani_category , board_reg_date , board_viewcount , commentcount , likecount , fileAttached) VALUES (#{board_userno} , #{board_title} , #{board_content} , #{board_ani_category} , now() , 0 , 0 , 0 , #{fileAttached})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE boardno = #{boardno} and board_userno = #{LoginId}
